CommandDefinition.Name: enabletriggerinstance
CommandDefinition.Description: reenable a previous disabled trigger instance.

Argument.Name: triggerinstancename
Argument.Description: The name of the triggerInstance to enable.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The name of the version of the application.

Argument.Name: orderentrancelimit
Argument.Description: Amount of orders to be processed before the trigger deactivates.

BoolOption.Name: v
BoolOption.Description: Print verbose output of the state after the operation has finished.
